    C

    ClientHandler - Class in Unnamed Package

    LogConsumer - Class in Unnamed Package

    LogEntry - Class in Unnamed Package
    The LogEntry class represents a single log entry for HTTP requests in JSON format.
    LogEntry(String, String, String, String, int) - Constructor for class LogEntry
    Constructs a new LogEntry with all required fields.

    MainHTTPServerThread - Class in Unnamed Package
    The MainHTTPServerThread class implements the core HTTP server that listens on a specified port.
    MainHTTPServerThread(ServerConfig, ThreadPool, FileAccessController, BlockingQueue<LogEntry>, Semaphore) - Constructor for class MainHTTPServerThread
    Constructs a new MainHTTPServerThreads with the specified configuration, thread pool, file access controller, log queue, and request limiter.

    R
